extendedInfo.description: The official attendee app the for The SEMA SHOW 2012 ConnectME Mobile is designed to help you create the ultimate show experience. In addition to an electronic show guide, this app connects you with exhibitors via an automatic matching component, provides a searchable database of exhibitors, sessions and speakers, lets you create an appointment agenda and receive show organizer updates. Itâs never been more convenient to plan a course of action for the show. SHOW GUIDE - A searchable, up-to-date directory of all exhibiting companies, available sessions and speakers makes the ultimate mobile show guide. AUTOMATED MATCHING - Robust matching functionality connects attendees to exhibitor based upon registration demographic information. Attendees can also search for exhibitors by company name or product category and expand their list of matches. APPOINTMENT SCHEDULER - Attendees can create and manage appointments with exhibitors both on and off the show floor designing a course of action for the event. AGENDA BUILDER - An itinerary of session and exhibitor appointments currently scheduled for the attendee enables the registrant to make the most of their time. ELECTRONIC LITERATURE - Attendees can download and view exhibitors electronic literature. MESSAGING SERVICE - Attendees can receive important and informative messages sent out by the organizer. FLOOR MAP - A viewable map to navigate the show floor with ease. FULL INTEGRATION - Convenient location within the registration dashboard makes connecting your registrants quick and easy.

reviews.title: Almost useless app
reviews.comment: Map feature crashes the phone. The myexhibitors list is full of companies you didn\'t add to it. There\'s no way to clear this list so you can add exhibitors that you actually want to visit. Hopefully this app is fixed next year.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy 3
reviews.comment: This app doesn\'t work on my phone at all. Although it its a really cool concept, the maps never load
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mistake of an app
reviews.comment: Crashes when you attempt to load the map. Crashes when you attempt to view your schedule. Lots of hope for this has proven to be hype. Waste of time to download.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Maps won\'t work.
reviews.comment: The map feature tries to load and then stops and goes back to the load screen. Organizer is also inoperative.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waste of time!
reviews.comment: App claims to have a lost of exhibitors, map, etc. But it doesn\'t. It has a bare bones write up with his and location. That\'s it...doesn\'t even deserve one star
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fire the programmers
reviews.comment: Exhibitor listing is OK but since the mapping code crashes at every use this app is worthless. Better luck next year.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: Nothing works, nothing. At this date in time the rating shows 5 people have it 5 stars, but count them and there are only 2. Don\'t the tech people test these apps before they go live.  Doesn\'t work on a smart phone or a tablet. Don\'t waste your time downloading it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Will not load map
reviews.comment: Will not load map, and will not load booth locations, I\'m only here today and tomorrow, hope it gets fixed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not effective
reviews.comment: I could never get the map to open up.  The schedule took forever to load in order to add the classes to my schedule.  Great theory, fail in execution
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Should be ashamed & fired.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Maps? What maps?
reviews.comment: With 7.4 MB of download, maps should load automatically, but these never load, a continuous loop of no maps never shows. Much improvements for next year. We\'re in the future and SEMA is behind...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: More Info
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t recognize company info.  Why not give more basic information when logging in as a guest?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: slow
reviews.comment: 997cc slow, worthless
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Don\'t bother, doesn\'t work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolute CRAP.
reviews.comment: Better luck next year.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unsure as of yet
reviews.comment: If you log in as a guest you can redirect to a webpage with some basic SEMA show info... awesome features. Not sure about the features once you log in, I have yet to find my company login info.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: works wonderfully
reviews.comment: map takes a little while to load for me. however, very much a useful tool to have on hand.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Map does not work
reviews.comment: I was most excited about the map feature of this app but the app crashes anytime I open the map please fix asap
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Crap
reviews.author: A Google User
